nav.div: North Cow Creek School » School Info » Emergency Closure Procedures

blockquote.div: With the return of the storm season, I would like to review our procedures in the event that a storm necessitates a school closure.
If school will not be open for the day we do two things:

ul.li: Utilize our automated phone system to send the message to the primary phone number on a student’s contact list.

Notify the local media. Please check KRCR-TV (7) or KHSL-TV (12) and KNVN-TV (24), KQMS, KSHA, KRDG, KRRX, KNNN, KNRO, KNCQ-Q97, KEWB, KESR, KHRD, KKXS, KLXR, or KVIP radio, or www.Redding.com after 6:00 a.m. for announcements of school closure.

div.blockquote: If it is necessary to close school during the school day, we will use our automated phone system to send a message to the student’s primary phone numbers. If a parent or guardian cannot be reached, we will notify the contacts on the student’s emergency card concerning the closure. As always, please let us know if there is a change to your phone numbers.
